### Personal projects
Here I will publish my personal projects.
* [2048](http://bolorsociedad.github.io/2048/): An adapted version of the popular game 2048.

### About me
I am a Math student who loves creating stuff for the web. Send me an email, if you want to: [bolorsociedad@gmail.com](bolorsociedad@gmail.com).
